title: Reconnect button not working.
body: My friend and I started an ARAM game and I never was sent to the loading screen. I reset my league client hoping that would fix it, but all I got was the reconnect button. I press it, "Game is still in progress..." then I still can't get in the game. I swear if I get a ban for this...

replies.body: I have this problem now ... How did you fix it ?
yeah lots of ppl have same problem
You need to reboot the whole client to fix that, often.
